item.title: Items spawn at heightlevel
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount) { try { outStream.createFrame(85); outStream.writeByteC((itemY - 8 * mapRegionY)); outStream.writeByteC((itemX - 8 * mapRegionX)); outStream.createFrame(44); outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(itemID); outStream.writeWord(itemAmount); outStream.writeByte(0); } catch (Exception e) { sM("An error has occured while creating ground item."); } }

how would i make it check height aswell?

or make it always make the item on heightlevel 0?

Read full topic
